text: Muthuvara Mahadeva Temple () is a Shiv temple located in Muthuvara, Thrissur city of India. Parashurama, the sixth avatar of Vishnu has installed the idol. The idol is in rowdrabhavam. The temple have one sreekovil for Shiv and another one for Vishnu. ==References== Category:Shiva temples in Kerala Category:Hindu temples in Thrissur district Category:108 Shiva Temples
title: Muthuvara Mahadeva Temple
